1: For the music director, a psalm of David.
2: May Adonai answer you in the day of trouble! May the Name of the God of Jacob set you up securely on high.
3: May He send you help from the Sanctuary and support you from Zion.
4: May He remember all your meal offerings and accept the fat of your burnt offering. Selah
5: May He grant you your heart's desire and fulfill all your plans.
6: We will shout for joy in your victory and lift up our banners in the Name of our God! May Adonai fulfill all your petitions.
7: Now I know that Adonai saves His anointed. He answers him from His holy heaven with saving strength of His right hand.
8: Some have chariots, some have horses, but we remember the Name of Adonai our God.
9: They have collapsed and fallen, but we rise up and support each other.
10: Adonai, save the king! Answer us on the day we call!
